00022 /// @defgroup cpPinJoint cpPinJoint
00023 /// @{
00024 
00025 const cpConstraintClass *cpPinJointGetClass();
00026 
00027 /// @private
00028 typedef struct cpPinJoint {
00029         cpConstraint constraint;
00030         cpVect anchr1, anchr2;
00031         cpFloat dist;
00032         
00033         cpVect r1, r2;
00034         cpVect n;
00035         cpFloat nMass;
00036         
00037         cpFloat jnAcc, jnMax;
00038         cpFloat bias;
00039 } cpPinJoint;
00040 
00041 /// Allocate a pin joint.
00042 cpPinJoint *cpPinJointAlloc(void);
00043 /// Initialize a pin joint.
00044 cpPinJoint *cpPinJointInit(cpPinJoint *joint, cpBody *a, cpBody *b, cpVect anchr1, cpVect anchr2);
00045 /// Allocate and initialize a pin joint.
00046 cpConstraint *cpPinJointNew(cpBody *a, cpBody *b, cpVect anchr1, cpVect anchr2);
00047 
00048 CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpPinJoint, cpVect, anchr1, Anchr1);
00049 CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpPinJoint, cpVect, anchr2, Anchr2);
00050 CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpPinJoint, cpFloat, dist, Dist);
00051 
00052 ///@}
